        public char toChar()
        Returns the char equivalent of the current state of the hero: '^' if NORMAL_back '>' if NORMAL_right '<' if NORMAL_left 'v' if NORMAL_front '1' if ARMED_right '2' if ARMED_front '3' if ARMED_left '4' if SHIELDED_right '5' if SHIELDED_front '6' if SHIELDED_left '7' if ARMED_SHIELDED_right '8' if ARMED_SHIELDED_front '9' if ARMED_SHIELDED_left 'W' if WINNER '†' if DEAD

        A char data type
